title: Trudeau's nine years as Canada's prime minister... in 85 seconds
description: The second-youngest PM stepped down amid growing pressure from within his party and beyond.
excerpt: The second-youngest PM stepped down amid growing pressure from within his party and beyond.
text: After nine years in office, Justin Trudeau resigned amid growing pressure from within his party and beyond, stating that Canada deserves a "real choice" in the next election.Acknowledging the internal battles, he recognised was no longer the best option for Canadians. Trudeau said he will stay on as PM until a new Liberal Party leader is chosen2 hours agoJustin TrudeauCanadaExplore MoreWatch moment Trudeau announces he will step down9 hrs agoUS & CanadaWhere is Santa right now? html:
After nine years in office, Justin Trudeau resigned amid growing pressure from within his party and beyond, stating that Canada deserves a "real choice" in the next election.

Acknowledging the internal battles, he recognised was no longer the best option for Canadians.

Trudeau said he will stay on as PM until a new Liberal Party leader is chosen

2 hours ago

Justin Trudeau

Canada
